titles.title: Helping Our Middle-Class Entrepreneurs Act
HOME Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a standard home office deduction.
HOME Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Helping Our Middle-Class Entrepreneurs Act or the HOME Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer who uses a residence to conduct a trade or business a standard tax deduction equal to the lesser of $1,500 or the taxpayer's gross trade or business income derived from the business use of such residence.
